show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
My guest Michael Orban vividly describes his journey from the jungles of Vietnam and the trauma of war through a... <!--more--> recovery that includes regaining meaning from African pigmies and their spiritual immersion in nature.
   He was inspired, as I have also been, by Albert Schweitzer’s “will to live” and “reverence for life,”  and explains how he applies relationship and values to helping veteran’s from today’s wars.
